lyrics:
9 contributorsspare me the details lyricsverse 1
my girlfriend my dumb donut
went out to a party just the other night
but three hours later and seven shots of j√§ger
she was in the bedroom with another guy

prechorus
and i dont really wanna know
so dont tell me anymore
and i really dont wanna hear
about her feet all up in the air

chorus
and well im not the one who acted like a ho
why must i be the one who has to know
im not the one who messed up big time
so spare me the details if you dont mind

verse 2
now i can understand friends who wanna tell me
think theyre gonna help me open up my eyes
but the playbyplay makes me wanna lose it
every time you do it man it turns the knife

prechorus
and i dont really wanna know
so dont tell me anymore
and i really dont wanna hear
about her feet all up in the air
see the offspring liveget tickets as low as 56you might also likechorus
and well im not the one who acted like a ho
why must i be the one who has to know
im not the one who messed up big time
so spare me the details if you dont mind

bridge
now i dont need to hear about the sounds they were makin
and i dont need to hear about how long it was takin
or how the walls they were shakin oh

verse 3
now lying in bed wallowin in sorrow
missing the tomorrow that we couldve had
running through my head over and over
things i never told her now just make me sad
and it drives me insane sittin with the vision
stuck with that image burned into my brain
and i feel so dumb that i could ever trust her
while someone else fucked her then awalked away

prechorus
and i dont really wanna to know
so dont tell me anymore
and i really dont wanna hear
about her feet all up in the air
chorus
and so im not the one who acted like a ho
why must i be the one who has to know
im not the one who messed up big time
so spare me the details if you dont mind

outro
cause i dont wanna know dont wanna know
spare me the details if you dont mind
dont wanna know dont wanna know
spare me the details if you dont mind2embed
